nodes.bodyText: maybe add a justification for suppressing this warning
It turned out this is not needed
Could use a not-null assertion here.
It would be verbose to assert all set methods
I would use a Map<Name, String> where Name is an Enumeration of catalog names (SYSCONGLOMERATES, SYSTABLES, SYSCOLUMNS, ...). This makes it easier to change and work with IMHO.
what's is SysIBMSchema and why do we search it if we can't find the table in the SystemSchema?

SYSIBM schema is a legacy system schema inherited from Derby. It is not very useful, but for completeness, splice should also search for this schema, and populate TabInfoImpl for sysibm.sysdummy1 table.
hmm .. we always return an empty row here, why is that?

maybe you should again after exiting the while loop that the table is enabled (and throw exception if it is not), because wait could've reached 2000 retries and the loop exited however the table is still not enabled yet.
I would throw, this could be misleading for users.
